Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lawndale/27th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays at Jackson due to an earlier medical emergency.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays at Jackson due to an earlier medical emergency.

Also, shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Fullerton and State/Lake.

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
